overview: KuwaitNET was started by Bashar Al-Abdulhadi in 1997 and began providing Webhosting and Domain name registration as the first specialized provider back then in Kuwait. Because of the increased demand on e-services KuwaitNET has moved from one man office in Surra city to a larger office in Hawally Binkhaldoun Street in the late 2000, Binkhaldoun St. is known of its popularity serving computer hardware and computer software since early 90s. The company now employs 25 people, including Mr. Al-Abdulhadi who is the CEO and the technical head of the company having its HeadQuarter at Olympia Towers in Salmiya. The great majority of customers that uses KuwaitNET services are serious companies and end users who require professional and experienced treatment which KuwaitNET provide as one of its basic features.
